long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
pile is a material design-ish chrome extension that show your pocket list.
the icons colors are dynamically computed.
⚠️ it is working, however, it is still a work in progress ⚠️

1.11.0:
- some fixes
  - more agressive caching
  - smiley uses currentColor (was black on dark background in dark mode)
  - fix: matching url was broken
  - defensiveness in pocket/get
- general dependencies upgrade

1.11.1:
- fix: autocomplete input width

1.10.0:
- fix: csp issue

1.9.7:
- fix: pocket API behavior change

1.9.6
- fix: some invalid URLs
- many technical changes

1.9.5
- feat: do not refresh (in the background) when showCountOnBadge is false

1.9.4:
- feat: scroll into view item matching the active tab (if any) when opening the popup/switching tabs → item is also opened & has green border

1.9.3:
- feat: change tabs with keyboard (ctrl+<index>)

1.9.2:
- fix: remember when the last selected tag was 'untagged'

1.9.1:
- fix search
- fully reload tab content on tab change

1.9.0
- add Algolia integration
- lots of under the hood additions & improvements

1.8.5:
- fix empty untagged message

1.8.4:
- autocomplete improvements:
  - sort autocomplete options by search term index
  - only show the "untagged" filter option if there are items without tags
- better list empty state

1.8.3:
- technical upgrade & fix css not loading in content script

1.8.2:
- change library used to extract colors

1.8.1:
- remember last tag when opening pile's menu
- allow to modify tags from modal with existing item

1.8.0:
- allow to add with tags

open-source : https://github.com/e-krebs/pile
